sql:
SELECT * FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 0 
  AND is_highschool = 1 
  AND speaks_english = 1 
  AND grade_english_pass = 1 
  AND (grade_math_pass = 0 OR grade_science_pass = 0);

SELECT * FROM students 
WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson' AND is_active = 1 AND grade_math_pass = 0 AND grade_science_pass = 0;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'H';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND is_active = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1 AND speaks_english = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);

SELECT first_name, last_name, 
       (CASE WHEN grade_math_pass = 1 THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END) AS math_status,
       (CASE WHEN grade_science_pass = 1 THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END) AS science_status,
       (CASE WHEN grade_english_pass = 1 THEN 'Pass' ELSE 'Fail' END) AS english_status
FROM students
WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'H';

SELECT first_name, last_name 
FROM students 
WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1 AND speaks_english = 1 
ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Olivia' AND last_name = 'Hudson';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1) AND (grade_math_pass = 1 AND grade_science_pass = 1 AND grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (speaks_english = 1 OR speaks_spanish = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1 AND speaks_english = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND is_highschool = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_active = 1 AND (grade_math_pass = 1 OR grade_science_pass = 1 OR grade_english_pass = 1);
